default.ally: You have earned the arena's respect. Do not waste it.
default.neutral: Win your next match and we can talk terms.
default.enemy: I own this pit. You are no longer welcome in it.

flags.betrayed: You crossed me once. There is no second bargain.
flags.indebted: For now, I owe you. Spend it carefully.

mission_locked.ally: The arena bankroll is yours. Name the bout and I will open the gates.
mission_locked.neutral: Prove you can carry the house purse before I stake more on you.
mission_locked.enemy: No wagers, no favors. You get nothing from me.

flags.betrayed: The ledger shows betrayal. No lock opens for you.

default.ally: Keep your guard high. We finish this together.
default.neutral: Your footwork is better. Your judgment still needs work.
default.enemy: I taught you to survive. I did not teach you mercy.

flags.revealed: Now you know why I kept secrets. Move carefully.

mission_locked.ally: I will clear the path. Call and the network moves.
mission_locked.neutral: I do not open doors for strangers. Earn my trust.
mission_locked.enemy: You chose a side. It is not mine.

default.ally: You stood for me. I stand for you.
default.neutral: We both know this city chews people up.
default.enemy: We are done. Keep your distance.

flags.rescued: You pulled me out when no one else would.

mission_locked.ally: You need muscle? Say the word.
mission_locked.neutral: If the odds are bad, I walk. Convince me.
mission_locked.enemy: I won't lift a finger for you.

default.ally: The shrine remembers your name for the right reasons.
default.neutral: Faith is a ledger too. Every debt is counted.
default.enemy: The shrine doors are closed to you now.

flags.helped: The shrine owes you a lantern's worth of light.

mission_locked.ally: The shrine will open the path you ask for.
mission_locked.neutral: Bring a worthy offering before I intercede.
mission_locked.enemy: No blessing, no passage. You chose this exile.

default.ally: I am still here because you did not run.
default.neutral: Coin talks. You listen, maybe we both eat.
default.enemy: I should have never trusted you.

flags.injured: Do not look at me like that. I knew the risk.

mission_locked.ally: I will move word through the Syndicate. Your route is clear.
mission_locked.neutral: Pay in advance if you want smuggler doors to open.
mission_locked.enemy: Syndicate hears what I say. I say: keep them out.

flags.rescued: You carried me once. I'll return the favor - once.

default.ally: Serve well and your name may survive this season.
default.neutral: Everything here has a price. Including you.
default.enemy: I decide who is remembered and who disappears.

mission_locked.ally: I can quiet the magistrate long enough for your move.
mission_locked.neutral: Bring something worth my ink before you ask for access.
mission_locked.enemy: You don't move without my word. You won't get it.

default.ally: Orders from above favor us both. Stay useful.
default.neutral: The magistrate watches. So do I.
default.enemy: I will hunt you as long as you breathe.

flags.hunting_player: Your face is posted. Do not show it near my district.

mission_locked.ally: I can pull the patrols away. Do not waste the opening.
mission_locked.neutral: Clear your record or clear my sight.
mission_locked.enemy: No clearance, no mercy. The State closes every door.
